title: Week 5 Recap: Lamar Jackson's Margin of Error Wins, Kenny Pickett's Passing Map Loses, and Brian Daboll for Coach of the Year | The Ringer NFL Recap Show
description:
Nora, Steven, and Ben get together to share their reactions to the Baltimore Ravens' impressive win over the Cincinnati Bengals. They discuss the advantages of having a kicker like Justin Tucker, go through the Bengals' receiver struggles, and examine John Harbaugh's fourth-down decision-making. Then, Steven and Nora then go over their winners and losers from the week, which include the Jets, Rams, Saints, and more.(25:16)
Hosts: Nora Princiotti and Steven Ruiz
Guest: Ben Solak
Associate Producer: Chris Sutton
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
